DOC.criteria: Female At least 18 year age Symptomatic unprovoked venous thromboembolism ( deep vein thrombosis [ DVT ] pulmonary embolism [ PE ] ) At least one pregnancy terminate intentionally Previous VTE patient current VTE exclude
